documentUploadExample.upload_a_document_image_to_see_2: Upload a document image to see 2

driversLicense.completionMessage: We can mark this as complete
driversLicense.description: Short, clear steps to finish this
driversLicense.title: Driver's license

welcome.firstTime: Welcome. I will help you organize what matters for your family, step by step, at your pace.
welcome.returning: Welcome back. We can continue preparing what your family may need.
welcome.afterBreak: Welcome back. Taking a break is fine. We can continue when you are ready.

dashboard.empty: We prepared suggestions based on what you shared. We can start with what helps your family most.
dashboard.nearComplete: You are close to finishing this area.

assets.firstAsset: We can start with something important for your family, like your home or a main account.
assets.addingMore: Each item you add helps your family understand what matters.

family.noTrustedPeople: We can think about the trusted people who might help your family if needed. Who would you trust to step in?
family.addingPeople: It is good to have trusted people you can count on.
family.definingRoles: Helping trusted people understand how they can help is thoughtful.

documents.firstUpload: We can organize your important documents so your family can find them easily.
documents.organizing: You are creating a clear system. Your family will know where to look.
documents.categorizing: This organization will save time and stress when these documents are needed.

will.starting: Creating a will shows care for your family's future. I will guide you through each decision.
will.inProgress: These are important decisions. It is normal to take your time.

overwhelmed.message: This can feel like a lot. That is understandable.
overwhelmed.suggestion: Would you like a short break, or to do one small step?
overwhelmed.reassurance: You do not need to do everything at once. Small steps help.

procrastinating.message: It has been a while since your last visit. These topics can be hard.
procrastinating.suggestion: Would you like to spend 5 minutes on a small step?
procrastinating.encouragement: Small steps still make a difference.

accomplished.message: You have made steady progress. Your family is better prepared because of your work.
accomplished.celebration: You can feel good about taking these steps for your loved ones.
accomplished.nextSteps: When you are ready, we can look at helpful next steps.

priorities.high: This is one of the most important things for your family to know.
priorities.medium: This will help your family and is worth doing when you have time.
priorities.low: This is helpful to organize, but you can focus on other things first.

timeEstimates.involved: Takes longer; you can save and return.

familyBenefit.immediate: Your family can use this information right away if needed.
familyBenefit.planning: This helps your family plan and make decisions.
familyBenefit.peace: This gives your family confidence about your wishes.

smart.basedOnAnswers: Based on what you shared, this may help your family.
smart.basedOnProgress: Since you worked on {{area}}, this is a natural next step.
smart.basedOnTime: With limited time, this is the most helpful next step.

encouraging.smallStep: This is a small step that can make a difference.
encouraging.buildingOn: This builds on the work you have done.
encouraging.almostThere: You are close to having this area organized.
